Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flight control cable fraying detected. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 01/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
